metadata.description: Service Tier: Free, Standalone, or PerNode

variables.ViewDescription: Active Directory Security Audit monitoring solution

Tile.Query: SecurityEvent | where (EventID == 624 or EventID == 4720) | summarize count() by TargetUserName | count

List.Query: SecurityEvent | where (EventID == 624 or EventID == 4720) | extend CreatedBy = SubjectUserName  | extend AccountName = SamAccountName | extend Time =TimeGenerated +330m  | project AccountName, CreatedBy,Time
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Tile.Query: SecurityEvent | where (EventID == 630 or EventID == 4726) | summarize count() by TargetUserName | count

List.Query: SecurityEvent | where (EventID == 630 or EventID == 4726) | extend DeletedBy = SubjectUserName  | extend AccountName = TargetUserName  | extend Time =TimeGenerated +330m  | project AccountName, DeletedBy,Time
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Tile.Query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4728 or EventID == 4732 or EventID == 4756 or EventID == 632 or EventID == 636 or EventID == 660 | where TargetUserName == "Domain Admins" or TargetUserName =="Enterprise Admins" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by MemberName | count

SecondTile.Query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4729 or EventID == 4733 or EventID == 4757 or EventID == 633 or EventID == 637 or EventID == 661 | where TargetUserName == "Domain Admins" or TargetUserName =="Enterprise Admins" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by MemberName | count

List.Query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4728 or EventID == 4732 or EventID == 4756 or EventID == 632 or EventID == 636 or EventID == 660 or EventID == 4729 or EventID == 4733 or EventID == 4757 or EventID == 633 or EventID == 637 or EventID == 661 | extend Action = iff(Activity =="4728 - A member was added to a security-enabled global group." ,"Added","Removed" ) | extend GroupName = TargetUserName | extend Time =TimeGenerated +330m | project  Action , GroupName, Time
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

queries.query: Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=624 OR EventID=4720) | EXTEND SubjectAccount AS CreatedBy | Select TimeGenerated, TargetAccount, CreatedBy, Computer
SecurityEvent | where (EventID == 630 or EventID == 4726) | extend DeletedBy = SubjectAccount | project TimeGenerated, TargetAccount, DeletedBy, Computer

search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4728 or EventID == 4732 or EventID == 4756 or EventID == 632 or EventID == 636 or EventID == 660 or EventID == 4729 or EventID == 4733 or EventID == 4757 or EventID == 633 or EventID == 637 or EventID == 661 | extend Action = iff(Activity =="4728 - A member was added to a security-enabled global group." ,"Added","Removed" ) | project  Action , MemberName, TargetUserName, TimeGenerated  | sort by TimeGenerated desc
SecurityEvent | where (EventID == 631 or EventID == 4727) | extend CreatedBy = SubjectUserName | extend GroupName = TargetUserName | project CreatedBy, GroupName, Activity, TimeGenerated
SecurityEvent | where (EventID == 634 or EventID == 4730) | extend DeletedBy = SubjectUserName | extend GroupName = TargetUserName | project DeletedBy, GroupName, Activity, TimeGenerated

List.Title: Active Directory Security Audit Solution
List.Content:
## Users and Groups Monitoring View
1. Created user accounts
2. Deleted user accounts
3. Group membership changes - Domain Admin and Local Admin
4. Related quries
 

Post your feedback and Let us know how to improve this solution 

#### Solution by Asitha De Silva

TileOne.Query: SecurityEvent | where (EventID == 624 or EventID == 4720) | summarize count() by SamAccountName | count

TileTwo.Query: SecurityEvent | where (EventID == 630 or EventID == 4726) | summarize count() by TargetUserName | count

General.title: Logged on Users to Active Directory Domain

Tile.Query: SecurityEvent | where AccountType =~ "user" and EventID == 4624 and TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | summarize count() by Account | count

List.Query: SecurityEvent | where AccountType =~ "user" and EventID == 4624 | summarize LastLogin = max(TimeGenerated +330m)  by Account | sort by LastLogin
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Donut.Query: SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4771 | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by TargetUserName | sort by AggregatedValue desc// Oql: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=4771 |measure count() by TargetUserName

List.Query: SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4771 | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by TargetUserName
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Header.Title: Computers that had most failed logon attampts

Donut.Query: SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4771 | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by IpAddress | sort by AggregatedValue desc

List.Query: SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4771 | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by IpAddress// Oql: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=4771 |measure count() by IPAddress_CF
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Tile.Query: SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4740 | summarize count() by TargetUserName | count

List.Query: SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4740 | extend Source= TargetDomainName | summarize count() by TargetUserName,Source
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Tile.Query: SecurityEvent | where AccountType =~ "user" and EventID == 4624 and TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | summarize count() by Account
Tile.Legend: User Name with their logon Computer IP

List.Query: SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4624 | where TargetUserName != "MSOL_d7b788949824" | extend DeviceIP = IpAddress | extend AccountName = TargetUserName| extend IP=replace(@'::ffff:', @' \1', DeviceIP) | extend Time =TimeGenerated +330m | summarize by AccountName, IP,Time
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

List.Title: Active Directory Security Audit Solution
List.Content:
## User Account Security Monitoring View
1. Domain logged on users last 24 hours
2. User logging failures
3. Computers where users failed to login
4. All Locked accounts last 24 hours
5. Finding users logged on computer (IP)


Post your feedback and Let us know how to improve this solution 

#### Solution by Asitha De Silva

Tile.Query: SecurityEvent | where AccountType =~ "user" and EventID == 4625 | summarize Failed = count() by Account| count // Oql: Type=SecurityEvent AccountType=user EventID=4625 | measure count() as Failed by Account
